name: K-MOR and the TRI-13 Invader
description:
.......Attention! The Triangle Empire was invaded a peaceful planet! 

.......You're peacekeeper name K-MOR, the guy with Giant K Greatsword!

.......Your mission is Repel the Triangle army and bring back peace to this planet!  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A non-gamer friendly action indie game make for school project, include with 3 Level,  1 Difficulty and 1 Life!

Fixed resolution at 1280x720 for best graphic experience.

Keyboard layout require : QWERTY 

"12+ from mild violence" - rate by MYSELF

Free to download and play! no virus and payments!

Free Project file! free to use! but only code and sound have no copyright! (no resell and duplicate my work, freely to share)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game designer/ Sound designer / Artist / Composer / Developer / Tester
